# Furloft Roof Shingle Replacement at Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site

## Solicitation Details

* Reference Number: cb-8196-56076950
* Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0107/A
* Publication Date: 2023-08-16
* Closing Date: 2023-08-31T16:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-08-31
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-07
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-11-30
* Tender Status: Expired

## Tender Description

Parks Canada invites contractors to participate in the procurement of Furloft Roof Shingle Replacement services at the Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site. The scope of work includes the supply and installation of construction fencing around the site, removal and replacement of the existing cedar shingles roofing system, and installation of flashing, caulking, underlay, and trim boards.

## Bid Submission Requirements

* Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official.
* Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba. Submissions must be made via fax or email, as per the solicitation document.
* Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted.
* The only acceptable email address for responses to bid solicitations is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca.
* The only acceptable facsimile for responses to bid solicitations is 1-855-983-1808.

## Enquiries and Contact

* All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.
* Enquiries must be submitted in writing and received no later than five business days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for response.
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Ken Lacanilao
	+ Email: kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (587) 832-1894

## Site Visit

* A site visit will take place at the Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site on August 24, 2023, at 10:00 AM CT.
* Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than August 23, 2023, to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

## Evaluation Criteria

* The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
